name: Quiet Manor
description:
Made for the Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend jam.

WASD - Move

Left Click - Interact/Action

Right Click - Aim (when a tool is equipped)

1/2 - Switch tool

Made with Game Maker Studio 2. 

Special thanks:
freesound.org
Leira for being a beauty
Jak for making that cool round ceiling lamp
Patience for those two eyeish paintings
GMI for the support

Since I managed to complete the game with seven minutes left from the deadline, rest assured: bugs will occur! Stay strong and let me know if you like it :)
